title: Jigoku No Sata Mo Ougon Shidai - Kaisha O Kubi Ni Natta Kedo, Renkinjutsu Toka Iu Cheat Skill O Te Ni Ireta No De Jinsei Ippatsu Gyakuten O Mezashimasu
alternative_title: Jigoku no Sata mo Ougon Shidai ; Jigoku no Sata mo Ougon Shidai: Kaisha o Kubi ni natta Kedo, Renkinjutsu Toka Iu Cheat Skill o te ni Ireta no de Jinsei Ippatsu Gyakuten o Mezashimasu ; 地獄の沙汰も黄金次第 会社をクビになったけど、錬金術とかいうチートスキルを手に入れたので人生一発逆転を目指します（コミック）
status: Jigoku no Sata mo Ougon Shidai ; Jigoku no Sata mo Ougon Shidai: Kaisha o Kubi ni natta Kedo, Renkinjutsu Toka Iu Cheat Skill o te ni Ireta no de Jinsei Ippatsu Gyakuten o Mezashimasu ; 地獄の沙汰も黄金次第 会社をクビになったけど、錬金術とかいうチートスキルを手に入れたので人生一発逆転を目指します（コミック）
description:
Description :
        It has been 30 years since the world and the world known as the frontier were connected. Countries around the world began to explore the frontier in search of new resources. Now, with qualifications, even civilians can pass through the gate and go to the frontier. And adventurers were born to bring back and sell the resources. Okita was suddenly fired from his job. With no savings, he decides to become an adventurer to make ends meet. Okita acquires the skill of alchemy in his first adventure. From this moment, Okita Hajime's life begins to shine with gold. At the same time, a  was born who breaks the common sense of the world.
